column4: hm.. in ubuntu to get something like gaim, you just have to write 'apt-get gaim' ?
does ubuntu get all dependencies for you, or you have to get those as well?
apt does it all for you
this is for my dad, and i'm not about to do that for him ;)
i see you cant google it either.
I doubt those programs would run in WINE
I like X-Chat, but BitchX more ;)
